channel.title: [PI] how do you upload your client?
channel.description: I went to all the uploading sites and when I drag my client it says I either failed or the file does not exist please help me.

item.title: [PI] how do you upload your client?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:9, topic:409835”][quote author=One camel link=topic=511109.msg3708936#msg3708936 date=1313214209]
Teamview me and see what I’m doing wrong?
[/quote]
Obviously you’re dyslexic.

  1. hover over your client folder
  2. hit the RIGHT click button on your mouse
  3. find WINRAR
  4. then find ‘add to YOURCLIENTNAME.rar’
  5. click that with your LEFT button on your mouse
  6. wait till it’s done and then go to uppit.com
  7. click upload now
  8. find YOURCLIENTNAME.rar
  9. DOUBLE click the LEFT button on your mouse.
  10. wait for it to upload.
  11. copy the link it gives you
    12 share the link with your players.

Now you have your up loadable client in just 12 easy steps.[/quote]

Thank you for telling him that

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how do you upload your client?

item.title: [PI] how do you upload your client?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

One camel:

Teamview me and see what I’m doing wrong?

Obviously you’re dyslexic.

  1. hover over your client folder
  2. hit the RIGHT click button on your mouse
  3. find WINRAR
  4. then find ‘add to YOURCLIENTNAME.rar’
  5. click that with your LEFT button on your mouse
  6. wait till it’s done and then go to uppit.com
  7. click upload now
  8. find YOURCLIENTNAME.rar
  9. DOUBLE click the LEFT button on your mouse.
  10. wait for it to upload.
  11. copy the link it gives you
    12 share the link with your players.

Now you have your up loadable client in just 12 easy steps.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] how do you upload your client?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

One camel:

I went to all the uploading sites and when I drag my client it says I either failed or the file does not exist please help me.

You’ll be needing a trusted program called: Win-Rar

You can download it here: http://www.win-rar.com

After downloading that and completing the process of installation, it will allow the new option when right clicking a file or document to “Add ‘myclientname’ to .rar…”

Than it will be converted.
The problem your having, (hopefully this will help others also) most file hosts that allow uploads don’t allow folders to be uploaded.
That’s why win-rar is extremely helpful in the private server industry.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how do you upload your client?
